notes.text:
This update for ncurses fixes the following issues:

Security issues fixed:

- CVE-2019-17594: Fixed a heap-based buffer over-read in the _nc_find_entry function (bsc#1154036).
- CVE-2019-17595: Fixed a heap-based buffer over-read in the fmt_entry function (bsc#1154037).

Non-security issue fixed:

- Removed screen.xterm from terminfo database (bsc#1103320).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: There is a heap-based buffer over-read in the _nc_find_entry function in tinfo/comp_hash.c in the terminfo library in ncurses before 6.1-20191012.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
